title: X-Men Omnibus
description:
I have compiled Fox's X-Men Universe and cut it into chronological order (using very good quality sound & video files).  I then split it into hour long episodes to make the viewing experience manageable.  It is a great way to watch the films as there are plenty of storylines that happen concurrently.

This is a complete cut of the X-Men films from Fox (not including Deadpool & Apocalypse of course).

The Fox X-Men Omnibus includes intercut scenes from the films:
X-Men Origins: Wolverine
X-Men First Class
X-Men
X2: X-Men United
X-Men: The Last Stand
The Wolverine
X-Men Days of Future Past

As I said, it is a very fun viewing experience and of course, everyone will have a different interpretation of how the X-Men Universe should go as far as chronology is concerned but this is a pretty meticulous cut.

I hope you enjoy all the hard work and can help me seed this for others.

I have completed the MCU's Phases 1 & 2 & 3 also and are all available on here as well
